name: Dangly Dude
description:
Fly the Rescue Drone around our goofy pocket of space and rescue as many Dangly Dudes as possible! Bring them back to the hospital without critically injuring them (or do- no judgement from us) to increase your score!

Instructions in-game.

Credits:

Wes - Code

Justin - 3D Art, 2D Art, Level Design

Ben - 3D Art, SFX

Alissa - Spaceship Model (you joked too loud)
